name: hades-live
description: This Hades mod provides a communication channel between Hades and scripts running in a local web browser. This can be used for debugging, twitch integration, or any other browser-based Hades extension one might think of.   ### Dependencies - [Mod Importer](https://www.nexusmods.com/hades/mods/26) - [Mod Utility](https://www.nexusmods.com/hades/mods/27)
author: kruft
